content: this top-to-bottom one-piece design fits everyone from babies to adults the pattern comes free in my latest blog post for diy lovers or simply grab an ad-free version from my shop for a complete ensemble find the matching scarf pattern as well don t miss out on this fantastic wear get the beginner friendly crochet seed stitch scarf pattern here 1 **first hat of the month club cal pattern for 2024 ** > this pattern will be available as a > free pdf download until january 29 > 2024 at 11 59 pm est new york time > 23 59 est for cal participants > simply add the pattern to your cart > before 11 59 pm est on january 29th > and it will show as $0 00 the free pattern will be available on my blog beginning on january 28 2024 at 8 00 pm est new york time 20 00 est > this pattern is available for free on > my blog which is monetized by ads if > you prefer an ad-free version of the > pattern it is available to purchase > right here on ravelry ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ tiktok https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2024 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/a-seed-stitch-scarf
